text: Arnaldo Pambianco (16 August 1935 – 6 July 2022)Il ciclismo piange Pambianco: trionfò al Giro d’Italia 1961 was an Italian professional road racing cyclist. He won in the 1961 Giro d'Italia. He competed at the 1956 Summer Olympics and came in seventh place. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Olympians for Italy Category:Italian cyclists
title: Arnaldo Pambianco
